lexUnit.name: disorder.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a disruption of normal physical or mental functions

sentence.text: The most common are phenylketonuria , which is a deficiency of the enzyme which converts amino-acids , and disorders caused by the inability of enzymes to cope with carbohydrates .
